# First filter

let's get rid of all the genes/genomes that have less than 90% of identity
```{r}
filtered_table <- hit_table[hit_table$`%_identity` > 90,]

table(filtered_table$seq_num)
filtered_table[filtered_table$seq_num == 37,]
```
